abstract: The Far Eastern Economic Review, a Murdoch-owned publication, drops plans to review “Rupert’s Adventures in China: How Murdoch Lost a Fortune and Found a Wife.”
snippet: The Far Eastern Economic Review, a Murdoch-owned publication, drops plans to review “Rupert’s Adventures in China: How Murdoch Lost a Fortune and Found a Wife.”
lead_paragraph: When Rupert Murdoch took control in December of Dow Jones, publisher of The Wall Street Journal, he also collected a small Hong Kong monthly, The Far Eastern Economic Review.

headline.main: Review of Book on Murdoch Is Killed
headline.print_headline: Review of Book on Murdoch Is Killed

abstract: The Bush administration joined with the European Union in filing suit with the World Trade Organization to protest China’s rules governing foreign financial news services.
snippet: The Bush administration joined with the European Union in filing suit with the World Trade Organization to protest China’s rules governing foreign financial news services.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  In a new escalation of trade disputes with China, the Bush administration joined with the European Union on Monday in filing suit with the World Trade Organization to protest China’s requirement that foreign financial news services operate through a government-designated distributor.

headline.main: Trade Case Takes Aim at China on Financial Data
